name: Ego Whip V
book: Pathfinder Roleplaying Game Occult Adventures © 2015, Paizo Inc.
text: This functions as ego whip I, but the target takes –10 penalty to the chosen ability score and is staggered for 1d10 rounds on a failed Will save. This spell can be undercast.
text_zh: 该法术的功能如同自性鞭笞 I（Ego Whip I）一般，不过当目标的意志豁免检定失败时，会在被选择的属性上承受-10减值，并且恍惚（staggered）1d10轮。该法术可以被降阶施法。
